name: 林靖茹
objective: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以C語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對C語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹C語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C語言與物件導向：介紹C++與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
schedule:
week 1. Introduction to programming languages
- Various programming languages as well as their properties
- The history, the structure and advantages of C language
- The first simple C program
week 2. Overview of C
- The structure of a program
- Keywords
- Debugging tools
week 2. Data types
- Variables and constants
- Data types (int, char, float, etc)
- Size of data types
- Data type transformation
week 3. Basic Input and Output
- printf(), scanf()
- getchar(), putchar()
week 3. Operators and Expression
- Logical operators and arithmetic operators
- Priority
- Expression
week 4-6. Flow Control
- if-else
- switch
- for
- while
- do while
- break and continue
week 7-8. Function
- Declaration of a function
- Function arguments
- Variable scope
- Comparison between functions and preprocessor macros
week 9. Mid-term
week 10. Arrays
- 1-D array
- 2-D array
- Passing arrays to functions
- Sorting arrays
week 11-12. Pointers
- Pointer operators
- Pointers and address
- Pointers and functions
- Pointers and arrays
week 13. String
- Strings and characters
- Functions related to string
week 14-15. Structure
- Structure definition
- Initializing structure
- Nested structure
- typedef
- Union
week 16. File I/O
- File and streams
- Create a file
- Read/Write a file
week 17. C++
- Introduction to object-oriented programming
week 18. Final-term
scorePolicy:
Labs and Projects: 50%
Midterm: 20%
Final: 25%
Class Participation: 5%
materials:
C How to Program (5th Edition) by Paul Deite
C程式設計藝術(第五版), 陳大任、陳心瑋著, 全華出版
